comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The former Miss Marguerite Hyde "Daisy" Leiter of Chicago: jssgallery.org/Paintings/Miss_Daisy_Leiter.htm

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: She married Henry Howard, 19th Earl of Suffolk in 1904 (en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Howard,_19th_Earl_of_Suffolk) Short biography of her in www.planetsuffolk.com/suffolkhillsarizona.htm (the Suffolk Hills are named after her). An article about her marriage is in The San Francisco call., February 05, 1905, Image 27 "BRIDE OF AN EARL SHOCKS THE BRITONS", with photo. Lady Curzon was her sister, see The Hawaiian star., July 18, 1906, SECOND EDITON, Image 1

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for this great research. We'll add some of this information to the record the next time we update.
